description: Try our easy to follow Thai Fish Bruschetta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Thai Fish Bruschetta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 seeds and grains sourdough loaf, sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C and line a baking tray with baking paper.
Rub ginger and garlic into fish, place on prepared tray and bake for 15 minutes or until cooked through. Flake using two forks.

Place Thai salad on top of sourdough slices and top with snow peas, barramundi and tomatoes to serve. Note: The dressing provided with this product is not required for this recipe. Refrigerate it and use it for another salad within its useby date range.
